  Subject: [samuraihistory] another help request


  Can anyone provide any further information on the sozo clan/brothers 
  mentioned in the book Code of Bushido? They eemed to embody the true 
  samurai spirit even though they were not high ranking samurai. I also 
  believe there is a japanesemovie about them..

  thanks
  Paul
